  • 构造器详细资料

    • OrganizerNotificationCustomAdapter

      public OrganizerNotificationCustomAdapter(android.content.Context context, ArrayList<android.util.Pair<String,String>> data, HashSet<Integer> selectedPositions)
      OrganizerNotificationCustomAdapter is a custom adapter for displaying a list of entrants. It supports highlighting selected items and customizing the appearance of list items.

    • getView

      public android.view.View getView(int position, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Returns the unique ID for the item at the specified position. Since the position is unique in the list, it is returned as the ID.
      指定者:
      getView 在接口中 android.widget.Adapter
      覆盖:
      getView 在类中 android.widget.ArrayAdapter<android.util.Pair<String,String>>
      参数:
      position - The position of the item in the data set.
      返回:
      The position of the item.
